thread.title: Beautiful Bites: A Trio of Recipes for Persian Tea Sweets

author: Louisa Shafia
title: Beautiful Bites: A Trio of Recipes for Persian Tea Sweets
text:
HERE’S WHY I serve Persian tea sweets for Passover. It’s sort of a long story. And it begins with a riddle:

How can a person be Iranian and Jewish, but not an Iranian Jew? This is the brain-twister I was born into, and for decades it had me flummoxed. My dad was raised Muslim in Iran, and my mom is an Ashkenazi Jew from Philadelphia. While I was growing up there never seemed to be any common ground between the two sides of my heritage, and celebrating one ran the risk of offending the other. So we kept a tense truce by embracing...
